about_the_game:
Immerse Yourself in Intellectual Meditation

Prepare to embark on a journey of reflection, where you’ll seek answers to profound questions and uncover the ultimate truth: What truly lies within the black box?

Intellectual Relaxation in a Busy World

In a world overwhelmed by stress, information overload, and endless media, our minds grow weary. This game offers a sanctuary of true intellectual relaxation—a space where you can escape the noise and immerse yourself in a meditative atmosphere. It invites you to ponder questions you haven’t yet thought to ask and guides you toward deeper understanding. No distractions, no endless streams of content—just you, the black box, and the answers it holds.

Unravel Mysteries

Prepare to encounter secrets, puzzles, ciphers, and much more. Those with keen eyes and sharp minds will uncover hidden messages and Easter eggs, each layered with deeper meaning and significance.

What’s Inside the Black Box?

With patience and focus, you’ll unveil what lies within the enigmatic black box. But the ultimate question remains: was the journey—and the discovery—worth the wait?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3 (Arch-based)
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2,4–3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3 (Arch-based)
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2,4–3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
